metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2086 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The configuration loader in ownCloud 5.0.x before 5.0.6 allows remoteattackers to obtain CSRF tokens and other sensitive information by readingan unspecified JavaScript file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
